title: New town
creator_credit: Halas and Batchelor Cartoon Films, John Halas and Joy Batchelor
brief_description: A cartoon film explaining the need for town planning to avoid a repetition of past mistakes. Diagrams illustrate how towns have grown without provision being made for proper transport, for the separation of industrial and residential areas and the provision of playgrounds and conveniently situated shopping centres.
